languages.text: Запретные слова, дарованные вам Пределом рассвета. Они наполняют вас могуществом, но вы не можете их познать — этот секрет будет раскрыт лишь с последним ударом вашего сердца.
A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
languages.original_text: Запретные слова, дарованные вам Пределом рассвета. Они наполняют вас могуществом, но вы не можете их познать — этот секрет будет раскрыт лишь с последним ударом вашего сердца.

traits.locale_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power — yet you can't know them. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power — yet you can't know them. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.

languages.text: 这是破晓锋刃赐予你的礼物，它的禁忌之语让你充满了强大的力量。然而，你目前并不了解力量的本质。只有当你的心脏最后一次跳动的时候，这禁忌的力量才会真正展露在你面前。
languages.original_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.

traits.locale_text: 这是破晓锋刃赐予你的礼物，它的禁忌之语让你充满了强大的力量。然而，你目前并不了解力量的本质。只有当你的心脏最后一次跳动的时候，这禁忌的力量才会真正展露在你面前。

languages.text: Diese verbotenen Worte sind ein des Rands des Tagesanbruchs. Sie erfüllen dich mit großer Macht. Für dich sind sie jedoch nicht zu ergründen. Ihr Geheimnis wird sich dir erst bei deinem allerletzten Herzschlag offenbaren.
languages.original_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.

traits.locale_text: Diese verbotenen Worte sind ein des Rands des Tagesanbruchs. Sie erfüllen dich mit großer Macht. Für dich sind sie jedoch nicht zu ergründen. Ihr Geheimnis wird sich dir erst bei deinem allerletzten Herzschlag offenbaren.

languages.text: Estas palabras prohibidas, un regalo del Filo del Amanecer, te insuflan un gran poder. Pero desconoces su significado. Su secreto solamente te será revelado con el último latido de tu corazón.
languages.original_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.

traits.locale_text: Estas palabras prohibidas, un regalo del Filo del Amanecer, te insuflan un gran poder. Pero desconoces su significado. Su secreto solamente te será revelado con el último latido de tu corazón.

languages.text: Offerts par la Lame de l'Aube, ces mots interdits vous confèrent une grande puissance, bien qu'ils vous soient pour le moment inconnus. Leur secret vous sera uniquement révélé lorsque votre cœur battra pour la dernière fois.
languages.original_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.

traits.locale_text: Offerts par la Lame de l'Aube, ces mots interdits vous confèrent une grande puissance, bien qu'ils vous soient pour le moment inconnus. Leur secret vous sera uniquement révélé lorsque votre cœur battra pour la dernière fois.

languages.text: 暁の刃からの贈り物であるこの禁断の言葉は、あなたを大きな力で満たす。しかし、あなたには知る由もない。あなたの最後の鼓動のみがその秘密を明かすことができるからだ。
languages.original_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.

traits.locale_text: 暁の刃からの贈り物であるこの禁断の言葉は、あなたを大きな力で満たす。しかし、あなたには知る由もない。あなたの最後の鼓動のみがその秘密を明かすことができるからだ。

languages.text: Tan Vakti'nin armağanı olan bu yasaklı sözcükler, sana muhteşem bir güç bahşediyor. Ancak senin için bilinmeyen olarak kalmaya devam ediyorlar. Bu sözcüklerin sırrı, kalbin son kez attığında açığa çıkacak.
languages.original_text: A gift from the Edge of Daybreak, these forbidden words fill you with great power. Yet, they are unknowable to you. Their secret will only be revealed with your very last heartbeat.
